ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
time=java.getString('meta[property=og:novel:update_time]@content')
java.put('time',time)
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
pay=result.match(/" vip"/)
pay&&java.put('pay',pay[0])
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=source.key+result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?list.*?)'/)[1]+',{"headers":{"referer":"'+s.url+'"}}'
java.put('toc',toc)
cache.delete(toc)
tocData=getTocData()
if(!tocData){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title+'·'+time)
}
result
</js>.container

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

更新日志请点击登录，更新书源中查看

兼容正式版阅读app
exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqtjurl = base_url + "/fqrecommend?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqlsurl = base_url + "/fqhistory?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        if (!userName.includes('未知用户')){
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        },{
            title: "个性推荐(番茄)",
            url: fqtjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
            }
        },{
            title: "历史阅读(番茄)",
            url: fqlsurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
            }
        }];}
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>
header: { "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0" }

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (String(baseUrl).startsWith("data:")) {
  let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
  let book_id = res.book_id;
  let tab = res.tab;
  let sources = res.sources;
  let url = res.url;
  let html = "";
  let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
  if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
  	if (sources=='69书吧') {
  	let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
  		html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
  		} else {
  		html = java.ajax(url);
  		}
                //java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧') {
    	cookie.removeCookie(url);
var x=`https://www.69shuba.com`;
java.longToast('需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证');
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证").body();
	
    let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            java.log(op);
            html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
            //java.log(html);
    	}
  }
  let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
  let op = { method: "POST", body: { html: html } };
  op = JSON.stringify(op);
   let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
   if (varia == 'null') {
   	varia='';
   	}
  varia=JSON.stringify({'custom':varia});
  //varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
  java.log(`${base_url}/detail?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`);
  result = java.ajax(`${base_url}/detail?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`);
}
result
</js>
$.data
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
  book_id,
  source: sources,
  tab,
  book_tts,
  tags,
  role,
  last_chapter_title,
  last_chapter_update_time,
  word_number,
  status,
  score,
  abstract,
  copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
  proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
  proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
  let cookieValue =
    String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
  key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
  key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
  java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
  let cookieValue;
  for (let h of host) {
    try {
      cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
      key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
      key = "";
    }
    if (key) {
      java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
      //java.log(cookieValue)
      removeCookie(h);
      removeCookie(base_url);
      cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
      break;
    }
  }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
  book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}

let nickname = '账号状态：⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录';
try {
let opcx = {
  method: "GET",
  headers: { cookie: 'qttoken='+key+';' },
};
opcx = JSON.stringify(opcx);
let user_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(base_url+'/get_avatar,'+opcx));
if (user_info.code==0){
	if (user_info.nickname) {
		nickname = '欢迎回来：' + user_info.nickname
		} else {
			nickname = '欢迎回来：' + user_info.email + "(请前往用户后台设置用户名)"
			}
}
} catch (e) {
	if (key) {
		nickname = '账号状态：已登录'
		}
	};

let loginStatus = nickname;

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 ${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
  let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
  if (isValid(book_tts)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
  }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
  if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
  let indentedAbstract = abstract
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
    .join("\n");
  info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
  info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
  info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
  info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
  info = String(info)
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
    .join("\n");
} else {
  basicInfo = "";
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
  addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
  addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
  addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
  if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
      .split("\n")
      .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
      .join("\n");
    basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
  } else {
    basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
  }
  info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.book_name
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab || "小说";
let url = result.toc_url || "";
var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}
var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (fqcookie) {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie);
};
setArguments('fqssionid', fqssionid);
java.put("tab", tab);
java.put("book_id", book_id);
let qtcatalog = {
  book_id: book_id,
  sources: sources,
  tab: tab,
  url: url,
};
qtcatalog = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(qtcatalog));
`data:;base64,${qtcatalog},{"type":"qingtian2"}`;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let res;
if (result.match(/晴天融合/)) {
  result = result.split("晴天融合4");
  res = {
    item_id: result[0],
    tab: result[1],
    title: result[2],
    sources: result[3],
    url: ""
  };
} else {
  res = JSON.parse(result);
}
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
   if (varia == 'null') {
   	varia='';
   	}
  varia=JSON.stringify({'custom':varia});
//  varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
let book_id = res.book_id;
let item_id = res.item_id;
let tab = res.tab;
let title = res.title;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
	if (sources=='69书吧') {
  	let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69,
                "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0"
                    };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            java.log(url);
            java.log(op);
  		html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
  		} else {
  		html = java.ajax(url);
  		}
                java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧' && book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
    	cookie.removeCookie(url);
var x=url;
java.longToast('需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证');
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证").body();
	
    let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0",
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            java.log(op);
            html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
            //java.log(html);
    	}
};
let content = "";
let data;
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let device, device_type;
try {
  device = java.androidId();
  device_type = "安卓";
} catch (e) {
  try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "苹果";
  } catch (e) {
    device = "";
    device_type = "安卓";
  }
}

let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
try {
	qtcookie = `qttoken=${String(cookie.getKey(base_url, "qttoken"))}; deviceId=${device};`
	} catch (e) {}
let op = {
  method: "POST",
  body: { html: html },
  headers: { cookie: qtcookie },
};
//java.log(html);
op = JSON.stringify(op);
java.log(op);
let content_url = `/content?item_id=${item_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&tone_id=${tone_id}&variable=${varia}&version=4.9.1,${op}`;

data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url);
try {
	data = JSON.parse(data);
  if (data.msg) {
    java.toast(data.msg);
  }
} catch (e) {}
content = data.content;
content = decrypt(content);
if (sources == "番茄" && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
  content = getComments(content, book_id, item_id);
}
data = JSON.stringify({
  content: content,
});
if (device_type == "安卓" && (tab == "短剧" || tab == "视频" || sources == '毒舌影视')) {
  data = {
    content: `【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`,
  };
  data = JSON.stringify(data);
  if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
  	let video_url = `${base_url}/online_video?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}`;
  	if (sources=='毒舌影视') {
  		video_url = content;
  		};
    java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
    java.toast("正在加载视频...");
  }
}
data;
</js>
$.content

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
if (res.method) {
  res = Object.fromEntries(
    res.body
      .replace("source", "sources")
      .split("&")
      .map((query) => query.split("="))
  );
  res.url = "";
}
let book_id = res.book_id;
java.put('book_id',book_id);
let tab = res.tab;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
	if (sources=='69书吧') {
  	let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
  		html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
  		} else {
  		html = java.ajax(url);
  		}
                //java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧') {
    	cookie.removeCookie(url);

    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 3;
  }
} else {

  } else {

  }
}

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  var parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
let op = {
  method: "GET",
  headers: { cookie: qtcookie },
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}},${op}`
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqtjurl = base_url + "/fqrecommend?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;
var fqlsurl = base_url + "/fqhistory?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        if (!userName.includes('未知用户')){
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        },{
            title: "个性推荐(番茄)",
            url: fqtjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
            }
        },{
            title: "历史阅读(番茄)",
            url: fqlsurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
            }
        }];}
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("番茄登录过期，已隐藏番茄书架");
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

$.data
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
  book_id,
  source: sources,
  tab,
  book_tts,
  tags,
  role,
  last_chapter_title,
  last_chapter_update_time,
  word_number,
  status,
  score,
  abstract,
  copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
  proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
  proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
  let cookieValue =
    String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
  key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
  key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
  java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
  let cookieValue;
  for (let h of host) {
    try {
      cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
      key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
      key = "";
    }
    if (key) {
      java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
      //java.log(cookieValue)
      removeCookie(h);
      removeCookie(base_url);
      cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
      break;
    }
  }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
  book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}
let loginStatus = key ? "✅ 已登录" : "⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录";

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 账号状态：${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
  let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
  if (isValid(book_tts)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
  }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
  if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
  let indentedAbstract = abstract
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
    .join("\n");
  info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
  info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
  info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
  info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
  info = String(info)
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
    .join("\n");
} else {
  basicInfo = "";
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
  addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
  addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
  addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
  if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
      .split("\n")
      .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
      .join("\n");
    basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
  } else {
    basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
  }
  info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

<js>
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab || "小说";
let url = result.toc_url || "";
var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}
var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (fqcookie) {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie);
};
setArguments('fqssionid', fqssionid);
java.put("tab", tab);
java.put("book_id", book_id);
let qtcatalog = {
  book_id: book_id,
  sources: sources,
  tab: tab,
  url: url,
};
qtcatalog = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(qtcatalog));
`data:;base64,${qtcatalog},{"type":"qingtian2"}`;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let res;
if (result.match(/大灰狼融合/)) {
  result = result.split("大灰狼融合4");
  res = {
    item_id: result[0],
    tab: result[1],
    title: result[2],
    sources: result[3],
    url: ""
  };
} else {
  res = JSON.parse(result);
}
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
   if (varia == 'null') {
   	varia='';
   	}
  varia=JSON.stringify({'custom':varia});
//  varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
let book_id = res.book_id;
let item_id = res.item_id;
let tab = res.tab;
let title = res.title;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
	if (sources=='69书吧') {
  	let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69,
                "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0"
                    };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            java.log(url);
            java.log(op);
  		html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
  		} else {
  		html = java.ajax(url);
  		}
                java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧' && book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
    	cookie.removeCookie(url);
var x=url;
java.longToast('需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证');
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证").body();
	
    let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 Edg/138.0.0.0",
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            java.log(op);
            html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
            //java.log(html);
    	}
};
let content = "";
let data;
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let device, device_type;
try {
  device = java.androidId();
  device_type = "安卓";
} catch (e) {
  try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "苹果";
  } catch (e) {
    device = "";
    device_type = "安卓";
  }
}

let qtcookie = cookie.getCookie(base_url);
try {
	qtcookie = `qttoken=${String(cookie.getKey(base_url, "qttoken"))}; deviceId=${device};`
	} catch (e) {}
let op = {
  method: "POST",
  body: { html: html },
  headers: { cookie: qtcookie },
};
//java.log(html);
op = JSON.stringify(op);
java.log(op);
let content_url = `/content?item_id=${item_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&tone_id=${tone_id}&variable=${varia}&version=4.9.1,${op}`;

data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url);
try {
	data = JSON.parse(data);
  if (data.msg) {
    java.toast(data.msg);
  }
} catch (e) {}
content = data.content;
content = decrypt(content);
if (sources == "番茄" && getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
  content = getComments(content, book_id, item_id);
}
data = JSON.stringify({
  content: content,
});
if (device_type == "安卓" && (tab == "短剧" || tab == "视频" || sources == '毒舌影视')) {
  data = {
    content: `【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`,
  };
  data = JSON.stringify(data);
  if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
  	let video_url = `${base_url}/online_video?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}`;
  	if (sources=='毒舌影视') {
  		video_url = content;
  		};
    java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
    java.toast("正在加载视频...");
  }
}
data;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
if (res.method) {
  res = Object.fromEntries(
    res.body
      .replace("source", "sources")
      .split("&")
      .map((query) => query.split("="))
  );
  res.url = "";
}
let book_id = res.book_id;
java.put('book_id',book_id);
let tab = res.tab;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;
let html = "";
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (url != "" && proxy == "本地") {
	if (sources=='69书吧') {
  	let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
  		html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
  		} else {
  		html = java.ajax(url);
  		}
                //java.log(html);
    if (html.includes("Just a moment...") && sources == '69书吧') {
    	cookie.removeCookie(url);
var x=`https://www.69shuba.com`;
java.longToast('需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证');
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"需要真人验证，请进入任意书籍详情页过验证").body();
	
    let ck69 = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
   let headers = {
                "Cookie": ck69
            };
            let op = JSON.stringify({"headers":headers});
            //java.log(op);
            html = java.ajax(url+','+op);
            //java.log(html);
    	}
};
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let op = { method: "POST", body: { html: html } };
op = JSON.stringify(op);
let varia = String(book.getVariable('custom'));
   if (varia == 'null') {
   	varia='';
   	}
  varia=JSON.stringify({'custom':varia});
 // varia = java.base64Encode(varia);
//java.log(`${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`);
let data = java.ajax(
  `${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&variable=${varia},${op}`
);
let device;
let device_type;
try {
  device = java.androidId();
  device_type = "安卓";
} catch (e) {
  device_type = "苹果";
}

if (tab == "小说") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 0;
  }
} else if (tab == "听书") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 32;
  } else {
    book.type = 1;
  }
} else if (tab == "漫画") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 64;
  } else {
    book.type = 2;
  }
} else if (tab == "短剧") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 3;
  }
} else {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 0;
  }
}
data;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let tab = result.tab;
let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;
let book_id = java.get("book_id");
let url = result.toc_url || "";
let qtcontent = {
	book_id: book_id,
  item_id: item_id,
  title: title,
  sources: sources,
  tab: tab,
  url: url,
};
qtcontent = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(qtcontent));
if (sources=='卷') {
	content_url = item_id
	} else if (sources == "番茄" && tab == "小说") {
    var base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server") || "";
  var fqssionid = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "fqssionid") || "";
   content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3","js":"book ? result : '${base_url}/get_review?book_id=${book_id}&item_id=${item_id}&ssionid=${fqssionid}'"}`;
} else {
  content_url = `data:;base64,${qtcontent},{"type":"qingtian3"}`;
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  var parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}`
</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>
